tool.name: Groot get
tool.description: Download pre-clustered ARG database that are ready to be indexed
tool.command:
if [ -f '/usr/local/ssl/cacert.pem' ] ; then export SSL_CERT_FILE='/usr/local/ssl/cacert.pem' ; fi &&
python '$__tool_directory__/data_manager_groot_database_downloader.py' --database '$database' --grootversion 1.1.2 --percentidentity 90 --json '$out_file'

param.name: database
param.label: Database name
param.option: Groot-db 90% identity, combine all sequences in ARG-annot, Resfinder and CARD
Groot-core-db 90% identity, same as groot-db but one copy of each sequence is kept and then this collection is clustered at 90% identity

tool.help: The groot get subcommand is used to download a pre-clustered ARG database that is ready to be indexed.
